channel.title: A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content on A Hugo website

item.title: About
item.description: Who am I? My name is Liam, and I’m a Data scientist. I currently work in financial research, and have a keen interest in R, open source data and football (AFL). What will I post about? I don’t know, mainly footy related, a bit of government and council data. Whatever takes my interest, I guess. What theme is this? The theme was downloaded from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.
